DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , open-label , single dose , 3-treatment , 3-period crossover study , 14- 17-day washout period dos . The study consist screen visit , study center admission ( precede Treatment Periods 1 , 2 3 ) , 3 treatment period ( 4 day ) , 1 washout period ( 14 17 day separate period 1 , 2 3 ) , exit procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assessing Dosing Time Calcium Vitamin D Relative BA 35 mg DR Risedronate Dosed With Food
DOC.criteria: female , 40 70 year age nonlactating either surgically sterile postmenopausal body mass index less equal 32 kg/m2 screening use bisphosphonate within 1 month history GI disease use medication within 714 day prior schedule dosing day
